title: Dear fellow Progressives.pdf
description:
This activist needs a little help from other Progressives keeping a post up if you have a CL account. all you have to do is read the explanation and then re-post my post.

After the spam algorithm calms down in a month or so I'll be fine. Normally I just say what I want but if you post on CL you know they have a unique format and you can do certain things that lower the flagging threshold on your posts for a period of time.


If you're a member of the Idiot Right that wants to make the typical right-wing dumbass comments on my upload, let me just say "kiss my big white ass" in advance. 


Remember, if you're counting on voting for Hillary in 2016 then you need to show up THIS November and giver her a Congress that will work with he or there's a good chance we're going to lose the ACA and the Right is going to proceed with plans to do other things like changing the CPI rules on Social Security and raising the interest rates on Student loans.
